H0.text: Who wrote ‘The Forsyte Saga’. E.M. Forster

H1.text: Who wrote ‘The Forsyte Saga’. D.H. Lawrence

H2.text: Who wrote ‘The Forsyte Saga’. Virginia Woolf

A4.text: The Forsyte Saga, first published under that title in 1922, is a series of three novels and two interludes published between 1906 and 1921 by the English author John Galsworthy.

A5.text: The Forsyte Saga earned John Galsworthy the Nobel Prize for Literature in 1932.
